channel.title: Macao on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Macao Forges Ties With Venice Days to Promote New International Short Film Festival
item.description: The Macao Government and Galaxy Entertainment Group, one of Asia’s leading casino and hotel operators, have forged a partnership with the Venice Film Festival’s independently run Giornate Degli
